text: #JusticeforJodian Update the results r back n its NEGATIVE!! for Covid-19 these ppl are evil. They took my lil sister from me. #JusticeforJodian @AndrewHolnessJM @christufton @fluffymisskitty @Nationwideradio @emilymshields @televisionjam
